runtime: shiny

```{r engine='bash', echo=FALSE}
  grep -e 'Patient name' parrec/100044_rest-on.PAR
  grep -e 'Max. number of dynamics' parrec/100044_rest-on.PAR
  grep -e 'Repetition time' parrec/100044_rest-on.PAR
  EchoTime=`tail -3 parrec/100044_rest-on.PAR | head -1 | awk {'print $31'}`
  echo ".    Echo Time                          :   $EchoTime"
  grep -e 'Preparation direction' parrec/100044_rest-on.PAR
  grep -e 'FOV' parrec/100044_rest-on.PAR
  PixelSpacingX=`tail -3 parrec/100044_rest-on.PAR | head -1 | awk {'print $29'}`
  PixelSpacingY=`tail -3 parrec/100044_rest-on.PAR | head -1 | awk {'print $30'}`
  echo ".    Pixel Spacing (x,y in mm)          :   $PixelSpacingX x $PixelSpacingY"
```
